content: in this legal case a court ruled that la ro fr donated 50000 euros to their son ad the court ordered that this amount be included in the estate and increased with legal interest the total value of the estate was determined to be 173000 euros with la ro ad entitled to a share of 7667 euros the court also ordered la ro fr to pay the litigation costs in favor of la ro ad sa pe the case involved the division of the estate and the collation of assets donated by the deceased the court determined that la ro ad must contribute the donated amount to the estate and the remaining assets were to be divided among the heirs the court also mentioned the legal requirement for collation which is the obligation for heirs to include donated assets in the estate the court concluded that a courtappointed expert would assess the division of the land included in the estate the costs of the litigation were to be paid by la ro fr based on the principle of succombenza the tribunal has made a final ruling ordering that the donated amount be included in the estate along with legal interest the total value of the estate is declared to be 173000 euros with la ro fr entitled to withdraw their share of 57667 euros la ro ad is also entitled to a share of 7667 euros la ro fr is ordered to pay the litigation costs in favor of la ro ad and sa pe totaling 5850 euros plus additional expenses the case will also address the dissolution of community hereditary assets in a separate order this decision was made by the council chamber in palmi on september 12 2019
